recipesJson.name: Crunch my Custard Rhubarb
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
**This is a delicious custard topped with oats and honeycomb.  The custard is filled with a tangy Rhubarb.**

The Custard is **INW Custard**.  This is a delicious and simple custard base.  I added **OOO Vanilla Custard Cheesecake** to boost the vanilla and creaminess.

The Rhubarb I choose was **DV Rhubarb Cuddle**  This is a tangy rhubarb that has been paired with Decadent Vapors Creme Anglaise, This also helps boost the custard a bit more.  

The topping is **WF SC Oats and Cream Cookie**.  This gives the oats taste and texture.  I also used **VT Honeycomb** at 1% it adds a bit of deep caramel and the honeycomb texture.

Hope you enjoy!  
Learn more about mixing here:
https://www.diydownunder.com/
https://www.facebook.com/groups/diydownunder/
https://discord.gg/kH4Fqbc
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTCwb7ULyfJALQlehomZZQA 
www.instagram.com/diydownunder

reviews.text: I had to play with my settings and turn my watts up higher than usual but once I hit that sweet spot this was SO freaking good.  Creamy, sweet rhubarb with subtle hints of the oats intertwined.   If you like custard and rhubarb then you have GOT to try this.  I let it steep for almost 2 weeks and it is absolutely delicious!
